verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H5971>people;<s%> give <S%H238>ear,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the world: <S%H2465><s%>
Both <S%H1571><s%> <S%H120>low<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> <S%H376>high,<s%> <S%H6223>rich<s%> and <S%H34>poor,<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> of <S%H2454>wisdom;<s%> and the <S%H1900>meditation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be of <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
I will <S%H5186>incline<s%> mine <S%H241>ear<s%> to a <S%H4912>parable:<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my dark <S%H2420>saying<s%> upon the <S%H3658>harp.<s%>
Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> should I <S%H3372>fear<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> when the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of my <S%H6119>heels<s%> shall compass me <S%H5437>about?<s%>
They that <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth,<s%> and boast <S%H1984>themselves<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6239>riches;<s%>
None <S%H3808><s%> of them can by any <S%H6299>means<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for him:
(For the <S%H6306>redemption<s%> of their <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H3365>precious,<s%> and it <S%H2308>ceaseth<s%> forever: <S%H5769>)<s%>
That he should <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5331>forever,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7845>corruption.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> that wise <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H3162>likewise<s%> the <S%H3684>fool<s%> and the brutish <S%H1198>person<s%> <S%H6>perish,<s%> and <S%H5800>leave<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> to <S%H312>others.<s%>

Their inward <S%H7130>thought<s%> is, that their <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall continue <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and their dwelling <S%H4908>places<s%> to all <S%H1755>generations;<s%> <S%H1755><s%> they <S%H712>call<s%> <S%H5921><s%> their <S%H127>lands<s%> after their own <S%H8034>names.<s%>
Nevertheless <S%H120>man<s%> being in <S%H3366>honor<s%> <S%H3885>abideth<s%> <S%H1077>not:<s%> he is <S%H4911>like<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that <S%H1820>perish.<s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> is their <S%H3689>folly:<s%> yet their <S%H310>posterity<s%> <S%H7521>approve<s%> their <S%H6310>sayings.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

Like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> they are <S%H8371>laid<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave;<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> on them; and the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over them in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and their <S%H6697>beauty<s%> shall <S%H1086>consume<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave<s%> from their <S%H4480>dwelling.<s%> <S%H2073><s%>

But <S%H389><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H4480>power<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H7585>grave:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> me. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Be <S%H408>not<s%> thou <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> is made <S%H6238>rich,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H7235>increased;<s%>

For <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H4194>dieth<s%> he shall <S%H3947>carry<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> away: his <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3381>descend<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.
Though <S%H3588><s%> while he <S%H2416>lived<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> his <S%H5315>soul:<s%> and men will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, <S%H3588>when<s%> thou doest <S%H3190>well<s%> to thyself.
He shall <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers;<s%> they shall <S%H5704>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%>
Man <S%H120><s%> that is in <S%H3366>honor,<s%> and <S%H995>understandeth<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> is <S%H4911>like<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that <S%H1820>perish.<s%>
